articles.title: Lionel Messi sits out as Dynamo beat Miami in U.S. Open Cup - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Lionel Messi watched from the sidelines as Inter Miami CF lost 2-1 to the Houston Dynamo in the U.S. Open Cup final after he was not named in the squad due to an injury picked up while on Argentina duty.
